Item.method_code:
Dim itemType As String = Me.GetType() Dim itemId As String = Me.GetID()
Dim tableName As String = itemType.Replace(" ","_") Dim SQLstr As String = "SELECT TOP 1 " & tableName & ".id"
SQLstr = SQLstr & " FROM " & tableName SQLstr = SQLstr & " WHERE " & tableName & ".config_id IN " SQLstr = SQLstr & "(SELECT " & tableName & ".config_id FROM " & tableName SQLstr = SQLstr & " WHERE " & tableName & ".id='" & itemId & "')" SQLstr = SQLstr & " AND " & tableName & ".generation like '%'" SQLstr = SQLstr & " AND " & tableName & ".is_current='1'" SQLstr = SQLstr & " ORDER BY " & tableName & ".generation DESC"
Return Me.getInnovator().applySQL(SQLstr)
Item.name: Get ItemID Of Current Gen
